amendment.description: Amendment to provide that none of the funds may be used to employ workers in violation of section 274A of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in part B of House Report 110-760 to provide that none of the funds may be used to employ workers in violation of section 274A of the Immigration and Nationality Act.

action.text: On agreeing to the Childers amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 416 - 1, 6 Present ) (Roll No. 528).
